description.heartrobber.wise_reinforceme: Use on an Experience Crystal in your offhand
description.heartrobber.lock: Locks an Item Frame when used on it up close
advancements.enhanced_pots.adventure.fil: Break a Decorated Pot with a Brush for it to retain its contents
advancements.heartrobber.adventure.death: Lose all your hearts and die permanently
advancements.heartrobber.adventure.decap: Subject a mob to a Charged Creeper explosion and collect its remains
advancements.heartrobber.adventure.hard_: Trim out a full suit of Netherite armor with a Rose Gold finish using the Silence armor trim
advancements.heartrobber.adventure.heart: Collect and consume a dropped Heart
advancements.heartrobber.adventure.reinf: Upgrade an Experience Crystal to house 30000 XP
advancements.heartrobber.adventure.reviv: Be revived with a Ray Condensing Beacon
advancements.heartrobber.adventure.you_l: Have all 16 Light levels in your inventory
advancements.heartrobber.end.high_logist: Use an End Relay to translocate an item
advancements.heartrobber.end.relay.title: Translocation
advancements.heartrobber.end.relay.descr: Use an End Relay with a Decorated Pot containing a Lodestone Compass on the bottom and one containing an End Crystal on the top with a Pressure Plate on it to teleport within the End dimension
advancements.heartrobber.husbandry.blue_: Breed a Blue Axolotl and catch it in a Bucket
advancements.heartrobber.husbandry.cryst: Crystallize honey by putting it in water in a cold, dimly-lit environment over Campfire smoke
advancements.heartrobber.metallurgy.allo: Obtain an Alloyment Smithing Template; with this you can alloy metals more efficiently
advancements.heartrobber.metallurgy.chai: Make yourself a full suit of Chainmail armor
advancements.heartrobber.metallurgy.chun: Craft a Chunk Loader; activate it by putting it over any lit redstone-based lamp
advancements.heartrobber.metallurgy.enve: Craft an Empty Envelope; it can be used to deliver items to others' Ender Chests
advancements.heartrobber.metallurgy.geol: Craft a Geolocator to help you find your place in this world
advancements.heartrobber.metallurgy.hear: Provide yourself with an artificially sourced Heart
advancements.heartrobber.metallurgy.insc: With a Tag and Inscriber in your mainhand, permanently inscribe a Card in your offhand
advancements.heartrobber.metallurgy.more: Use an Alloyment Smithing Template to produce more Steel
advancements.heartrobber.metallurgy.name: Eternal Marker
Craft a Name Tag; it can be used to name things
advancements.heartrobber.metallurgy.neth: Blast a Netherite Globule to obtain an efficiently produced Netherite Ingot
Alloy Gold and Netherite Scrap to obtain an unprocessed globule of Netherite
advancements.heartrobber.metallurgy.retr: Use a Retrieval Rod to return a sent Envelope or unseal a sealed one
advancements.heartrobber.metallurgy.root: The art of putting hard things together
advancements.heartrobber.metallurgy.rose: Obtain Rose Gold by alloying a Block of Copper with a Netherite Ingot
advancements.heartrobber.metallurgy.send: Name an Envelope with a recipient name, then use it in your mainhand with a payload in your offhand to seal it and then send it
Set up a Ray Condesning Beacon by placing an upright and above it an upside down Ray Condenser on top of a Beacon and placing 3 Hearts in the space between them
advancements.heartrobber.story.steel.des: Obtain a powerful alloy by combining Iron and Coal
advancements.minecraft.husbandry.tactica: Catch a fish... without a Fishing Rod!
